ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of WILLIAM T. SHORT of Burlington, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective January 6, 2003.
